description.fr: Vaincre toutes les Craquebilles. \--- {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Dévoile les {Summoning:397[CRAQUEBILLES]!}. \--- {%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Transforme les {Summoning:397[CRAQUEBILLES]!} en {ObjectMechanism:340,plural:other!},\v puis les mélange.
description.en: Defeat all the Creakrocks. \--- {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Reveals the {Summoning:397[CREAKROCKS]!}. \--- {%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Turns the {Summoning:397[CREAKROCKS]!} into {ObjectMechanism:340,plural:other!}\v then shuffles them.
description.es: Vencer a todas las crujinicas. \--- {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Muestra a las {Summoning:397[CRUJINICAS]!}. \--- {%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Transforma a las {Summoning:397[CRUJINICAS]!} en {ObjectMechanism:340,plural:other!},\v y las mezcla.
description.de: Alle Krachlbrocks besiegen. \--- {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Enthüllt die {Summoning:397[KRACHLBROCKS]!}. \--- {%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Verwandelt die {Summoning:397[KRACHLBROCKS]!} in {ObjectMechanism:340,plural:other!} \vund mischt sie anschließend.
description.pt: Derrotar todas as Smagabilhas. \--- {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Revela as {Summoning:397[SMAGABILHAS]!}. \--- {%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Transforma as {Summoning:397[SMAGABILHAS]!} em {ObjectMechanism:340,plural:other!},\v depois mistura.
